thread.title: Graphics Maintenance Engineer - Sports - Sports Media
thread.title_full: Graphics Maintenance Engineer - Sports - Sports Media

title: Graphics Maintenance Engineer - Sports - Sports Media
text: Works with external providers to resolve technical and workflow issues with provided equipment and systems. Implementation of a routine preventative maintenance program...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
